member.name: T:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.ElementHandleExtensions
member.summary: extension methods.

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.ElementHandleExtensions.QuerySelectorWithContentAsync(PuppeteerSharp.ElementHandle,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method runs element.querySelectorAll and then tests a RegExp against the elements textContent. The first element match is returned. If no element matches the selector and regular expression, the return value resolve to null. See also https://stackoverflow.com/a/37098508
member.param: A selector to query element for
A regular expression to test against element.textContent
member.returns: Task which resolves to pointing to the element

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.ElementHandleExtensions.QuerySelectorAllWithContentAsync(PuppeteerSharp.ElementHandle,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method runs element.querySelectorAll and then tests a RegExp against the elements textContent. All element matches are returned. If no element matches the selector and regular expression, the return value resolve to . See also https://stackoverflow.com/a/37098508
member.param: A selector to query element for
A regular expression to test against element.textContent
member.returns: Task which resolves to ElementHandles pointing to the elements

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.ElementHandleExtensions.Exists(PuppeteerSharp.ElementHandle)
member.summary: Indicates whether the element exists or not. A non null is considered existing.
member.returns: true if the element exists

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.ElementHandleExtensions.Exists(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{PuppeteerSharp.ElementHandle})

member.name: T:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.PageExtensions
member.summary: extension methods.

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.PageExtensions.QuerySelectorWithContentAsync(PuppeteerSharp.Page,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method runs document.querySelectorAll within the page and then tests a RegExp against the elements textContent. The first element match is returned. If no element matches the selector and regular expression, the return value resolve to null. See also https://stackoverflow.com/a/37098508
member.param: A selector to query page for
A regular expression to test against element.textContent
member.returns: Task which resolves to pointing to the frame element

member.name: M:PuppeteerSharp.Contrib.Extensions.PageExtensions.QuerySelectorAllWithContentAsync(PuppeteerSharp.Page,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method runs document.querySelectorAll within the page and then tests a RegExp against the elements textContent. All element matches are returned. If no element matches the selector and regular expression, the return value resolve to . See also https://stackoverflow.com/a/37098508
member.param: A selector to query page for
A regular expression to test against element.textContent
member.returns: Task which resolves to ElementHandles pointing to the frame elements
